steps.title: Use the {{EnvName}} API to Modify Watermarks in {{FileformatCap}} Documents

content.title: With **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})**, {{EnvName}} developers can easily modify watermark content in various {{FileformatCap}} documents. Here's a quick walkthrough:
content.step_1: Begin by loading the {{FileformatCap}} document using the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class, accepting file paths, memory streams, or byte arrays as input.
content.step_2: Construct a {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} object to search for existing watermark elements in your document, whether textual or graphical.
content.step_3: Once identified, the tool provides a collection of matched watermark instances you can update—adjust parameters such as color, alignment, font, or even embedded image data.
content.step_4: Finalize the process by saving your revised document to disk or any supported output stream using the built-in save methods.

more_features.title: Boost Productivity with Advanced Watermarking Tools
more_features.description: Accelerate document branding and protection in {{EnvName}} with our dynamic watermarking API. Insert, detect, modify, or delete watermark layers with minimal effort.

feature_1.title: Integrated Watermark Control
feature_1.content: Bring full watermark lifecycle control to your {{EnvName}} applications using {{ProdFullName}}. Avoid repetitive tasks by automating watermark setup, updates, and removal.

feature_2.title: Precision Tuning of Watermark Attributes
feature_2.content: Take full control over watermark aesthetics—resize, recolor, rotate, or reposition them to meet any visual requirement with our flexible API surface.

feature_3.title: Leverage Native Format Features
feature_3.content: Adapt to any file format by embedding watermarks into headers, footers, annotations, or backgrounds. Our API respects native structures for optimal integration.

code_1.content: Demonstrates how to change image watermark properties in a PDF document.
